lead_paragraph: To the Editor: "California to Decide if Doctors Can Aid in Suicide" (front page, Oct. 9) omits a key point about Proposition 161, which would make it legal for a physician to help a patient die. This is not only about death with dignity. It's about peace of mind.

headline.main: California Offers the Terminally Ill Mercy
